fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- This role's name is changed to whatever the user's nickname is. This applies to everything where the role's name would be revealed.
- If the user's nickname is of a role in <#970046125065265202> (rule 17 applies), they gain the ability of that role and may use it instead of their normal ability. Their nickname must remain the same from when they choose to use the ability to when it is processed, otherwise it will be cancelled.
- Yes, anyone with this role may change it to something else between when actions are processed and before day begins.
